bio:
I offer Mechanical Engineering Services consist of a vast range of engineering solutions , including drawing, design, graphics, animation,
and CAD-related services to align with the needs of my clients. My
Mechanical Engineering Services benefit clients by calculating the
space and durability of equipment, aligning test specifications with
project blueprints, testing individual tools and parts, and making
modifications based on the results of testing. Furthermore, I provide
detailed blueprints, evaluate sketches & designs, and guide you
through every step of your project till completion.
My mechanical design services include converting sketches to 2D &
3D CAD Modeling, developing 2D drafts for fabrication, installation &
assemblies, Machine & Tool design, Design & specification of material handling equipment, Cooling & Ventilation Systems Design, Piping
Design, and Stress Analysis

bio:
With a team of 50 people on board, we have been nominated as one of the top growing companies by Good Firms and more.

Our services include:

- Digital Marketing
- Search Engine Optimization
- Social Media Management (FB, Instagram, Pinterest, Youtube etc)

- Amazon Marketing,
- Etsy marketing

- Content Creation

High-end SEO Expert.

>> Absolutely at next level comparing to SEO competitors.
>> Nor 10 years experience, nor old methods used.
>> Unique strategy created and tested by myself, Google 2020 Spring updated.

Strategy.

>> Focused on long-term success.
>> No-risks, relevant for future Google updates.
>> Content marketing is #1 priority. Best backlinks - is your actual website's content.
>> Schema markup next level usage.

What is delivered.

>> SEO audit.
>> Keyword research.
>> Competitors research.
>> SEO strategy.
>> Technical SEO.
>> Onpage SEO.
>> Content marketing.
>> Schema markup.
>> UX(User experience) design.
>> Analytics.
>> Training.

Why do you need SEO?

SEO provides you higher conversion rate than any other selling channel. It provides you better image comparing to competitors.

Why you should hire me?

I am not buying links that are losing relevance from month to month. Instead of that I am changing your website to better, creating content that is worth more than any backlink. I am not providing you cheap solutions or anything risky. Only improvements.

In all the above mentioned services, we have our proven track records and positive reviews on nearly all freelancing sites.

All we need is to provide us an opportunity and we will prove back by our work.

Thank You!

Turnaround time: Guaranteed 1 hour 

Availability: 24x7

Payment Terms:  Payment terms are 30% upfront, 40% project midway and 30% on completion and approval.
